# dash-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute                | Description                                             | Type      | Default |
| --------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `max`                 | `max`                    | Maximum value of slider                                 | `number`  | `100`   |
| `min`                 | `min`                    | Minimum value of slider                                 | `number`  | `0`     |
| `minMaxLabelsVisible` | `min-max-labels-visible` | When `true`, the slider labels for min, max are visible | `boolean` | `false` |
| `step`                | `step`                   | Step value of slider                                    | `number`  | `1`     |
| `value`               | `value`                  | Value of the slider                                     | `number`  | `0`     |
| `valueLabelVisible`   | `value-label-visible`    | When `true`, the slider label for value are visible     | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event                    | Description                       | Type                |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `dashSliderValueChanged` | Emitted when hue has been changed | `CustomEvent<void>` |
